data.author: George Eliot
data.quote: The scornful nostril and the high head gather not the odors that lie on the track of truth.

data.author: Joan Rivers
data.quote: A man can sleep around, no questions asked, but if a woman makes nineteen or twenty mistakes she's a tramp.

data.author: Ogden Nash
data.quote: Progress might have been all right once, but it has gone on too long.

data.author: Susan Jeffers
data.quote: Feel the fear and do it anyway.

data.author: Ellen Herman
data.quote: Joel - That's the movies, Ed. Try reality. Ed - No thanks.

data.author: Mark Twain
data.quote: When in doubt, tell the truth.

data.author: Starline X. Hodge
data.quote: Just because it's only 'stuff' doesn't mean I can't appreciate it while I have it.

data.author: Alan Corenk
data.quote: Democracy consists of choosing your dictators, after they've told you what you think it is you want to hear.

data.author: Steven Wright
data.quote: Last night somebody broke into my apartment and replaced everything with exact duplicates... When I pointed it out to my roommate, he said, 'Do I know you?'

data.author: Thomas Szasz
data.quote: Men are afraid to rock the boat in which they hope to drift safely through life's currents, when, actually, the boat is stuck on a sandbar. They would be better off to rock the boat and try to shake it loose.

data.author: Kyran Pittman,
data.quote: Different and new is just the same old if you keep doing it over and over.

data.author: Frank Lloyd Wright
data.quote: Noble life demands a noble architecture for noble uses of noble men. Lack of culture means what it has always meant: ignoble civilization and therefore imminent downfall.

data.author: Dan Quayle
data.quote: I stand by all the misstatements that I've made.

data.author: Bob Dylan
data.quote: If the point is sharp, and the arrow is swift, it can pierce through the dust no matter how thick.

data.author: Confucius
data.quote: I want you to be everything that's you, deep at the center of your being.

data.author: Les Brown
data.quote: Life takes on meaning when you become motivated, set goals and charge after them in an unstoppable manner.

data.author: Leo Buscaglia
data.quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing-that's why we recommend it daily.

data.author: Donald Laird
data.quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.

data.author: William Butler Yeats
data.quote: Education is not the filling of the pail, but, the lighting of the fire.
